name: ButterWhipper
description:
What's it about?

Since there are so many chemical additives in a diary it is best to make some everyday products by yourself - like BUTTER! It is a hard and time consuming task though. This app will help You practice. 

How to play

Keep tapping with uniform and right speed to make a perfect butter!
You will lose if you will tap too fast, too slow or with mixed frequency. If you will stop tapping, you will also lose.

Can you beat your friends? Or you can just switch to accelerometer controls and make them laugh!
